text: Hello! I'm going through the CMS for Developers course, and I'm a bit stuck. I've created fields.json and added some fields, but I'm having trouble finding where to set them in the page editor. What's shown in the video appears to be out of date, and I can't seem to sort out where it's been moved to. I don't have this sidebar in my editor.
hi , If its a theme level setting - you can find those in the theme editor-
